item.description:
Greetings to all the incubators old and new!

Hi everyone!  We are switching it up and bringing it back to my backyard for Thursday. Just walk up the driveway before my house and come on back! 

So come on out and bring some friends!  I've got a smattering of laughs and fun planned for us all.

Remember no previous improv experience required!

Any questions?

 

Let me know!

 

Peace, laughter, lightness,

Jason J.

 

 

 

Come on out to this weeks incubator for another week of silliness, laughter, and of course improv games and exercises galore.

This group is for everyone whether you are an actor, improv comedien looking for extra practice or just looking to destress from your week and do something random, fun, and maybe a bit challenging for the brain.  Smile and come on down, your up next on the cambridge improv incubator!

Again, no previous acting or improv experience required.

Smile!  Hope to see you Thursday.

Any questions or concerns let me know!

Cheers! 

Peace, prosperity, and happiness,

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk up the driveway and around to my backyard!
item.why: we need to reconnect with our bodies, our minds, laugh, and unlock ourselves!
item.name: Improv Destination 5th Day of the week!
